file.name: api-spec.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: serverless-express-typescript-sqs
  version: 1.0.0

servers:
  - url: http://localhost:3000/local
    description: Local serverless API

paths:
  /produce-message:
    post:
      description: >
        Adds a message with a specified payload to a queue.
      operationId: produceMessage
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Message'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Message has been added to the queue.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                  payload:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/QueuedMessage'
        default:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/DefaultErrorResponse'

components:
  schemas:
    Message:
      type: object
      required:
        - payload
      properties:
        payload:
          description: >
            Defines the payload of the message. Should be between 2 and 1000 characters long.
          type: string
    QueuedMessage:
      properties:
        id:
          description: >
            Specified the id of the message in the sqs queue
          type: string
        payload:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Message'
    ErrorResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
        errors:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string 
  responses:
    DefaultErrorResponse:
      description: Body is invalid.
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
